      public java.util.function.Supplier<Map<String,List<Loan>>> getAllLoans()
      s Function that returns a key value pair, a Map<String, List<Loan>> in particular.

      K - is a String containing the key, the key is the account number of the client who requested a loan.

      V - is a String containing the value, the value is all the loans that the account requested. It is a List<Loan>
